preview.label: Enable Preview Mode
preview.comment: Enabled Preview mode. If set to YES, recommendation boxes are only visible if there is a special ?gr_reco_test=true parameter in the url. E.g.: http://example.com/example-product.html?gr_reco_test=true

api_user.label: API Username

test.label: Test Connection

best_box_limit.label: Personal Best Box Product Count
best_box_limit.comment: The number of items shown in "Recommended for you" boxes on general pages. This number must be between 1 and 10.

best_box_columns.label: Personal Best Box Columns
best_box_columns.comment: The number of columns in "Recommended for you" boxes on general pages. This number must be between 1 and 6. This option has no effects if the box is in the sidebar.

resynch.label: Synchronization
resynch.comment: Every user and product item will be exported or updated in your database.

only_salable.label: Only In-stock
only_salable.comment: If switched to YES, only products with quantities exceeding zero will be exported. If your store doesn't use stock management, also choose YES.

customer_update.label: Enable Yusp Customer Update
customer_update.comment: If a customer is saved on the backend, it will be updated in the Yusp system.

product_update.label: Enable Yusp Product Update
product_update.comment: If a product is saved on the backend, it will be updated in the Yusp system.

customer_registration.label: Enable Yusp Customer Registration
customer_registration.comment: If a customer registers on your site, it will be added to your Yusp database.

enabled_js.label: Enable Custom Yusp Javascript
enabled_js.comment: Please select YES if you want to edit or customize the Yusp extension's main javascript.

custom_js.label: Custom Yusp Javascript
custom_js.comment: Important! Here you can edit the main Yusp javascript. You have to replace the two occurrences of the "magento" string in your custom javascript with your Yusp API username above!

bulk.label: Enable Bulk Recommendation
bulk.comment: General recommendation setting. If switched to YES, bulk recommendation will be enabled.

log.label: Enable Debug
log.comment: Enable debug. In this case all transactions will be logged in /var/gravity.log.
